name: Lovely Neko Girl
description:
Lovely Neko Girl is a puzzle game with a soothing atmosphere, centered around neko girls. Enjoy 30 stunning pictures of hot girls accompanied by calming music as you complete each puzzle.

Gameplay
Involves rotating the puzzle pieces by clicking on them to progress through levels and unlock additional viewing modes. After completing a puzzle, players can view the full picture.

Feature
30 Sexy girls pictures & Relaxing music
Fullview mode after completing a level
Cheat button to complete the level quickly
